Name: ip
Description: IP address referenced in message - v4 or v6

Name: ipv4
Description: IP v4 address referenced in message

Name: ipv6
Description: IP v6 address referenced in message

Name: src_ip
Description: Source IP address - v4 or v6

Name: ip_proto
Description: IP Protocol Identification: id or name

Name: ip_proto_name
Description: IP protocol "Keyword" field from IANA protocol numbers https://www.iana.org/assignments/protocol-numbers/protocol-numbers.xhtml

Name: ip_proto_full_name
Description: IP protocol "Protocol" field from IANA protocol numbers https://www.iana.org/assignments/protocol-numbers/protocol-numbers.xhtml

Name: ip_proto_id
Description: IP protocol "Decimal" field from IANA protocol numbers https://www.iana.org/assignments/protocol-numbers/protocol-numbers.xhtml

Name: ip_proto_reference
Description: IP protocol "Reference"  field from IANA protocol numbers https://www.iana.org/assignments/protocol-numbers/protocol-numbers.xhtml

Name: src_user_uuid
Description: Source User - ID in the form of UUID

Name: event_process
Description: Process name that generated the event

Name: event_pid
Description: PID of the process that generated the event
